title: Are COVID Mandates Dying Off? | Guests: Rep. Chip Roy & Rep. Troy Nehls | 2/9/22
description:
Glenn starts the show discussing the latest Homeland Security alert for domestic terrorism, which he describes as “bone-chilling.” Glenn and Stu discuss the sudden shift of Democrats on masks and COVID mandates. Rep. Troy Nehls joins to discuss the Capitol Police and their apparent spying. Glenn and Stu discuss Pfizer altering its COVID data as it released its monthly papers. Rep. Chip Roy joins to discuss the fight to defund President Biden’s vaccine mandates. Brian Pickford, last living signer of Canada’s “constitution,” joins to discuss his lawsuit against the Canadian government over its vaccine mandates.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
